snippet: A year ago, Zach Wheeler, a top pitching prospect, was traded in a one-for-one deal for Carlos Beltran that set a precedent for trading players facing free agency.
abstract: New York Mets pitching prospect Zach Wheeler, who was traded in a one-for-one deal for outfielder Carlos Beltran that set a precedent for trading players facing free agency, is showing steady progress; currently has an 8-4 record with a 2.62 earned run average in 15 starts for Binghamton.
lead_paragraph: A year ago, Zach Wheeler, a top pitching prospect, was traded in a one-for-one deal for Carlos Beltran that set a precedent for trading players facing free agency.

headline.seo: Mets Prospect Zach Wheeler Focuses on Progress
headline.main: Mets Prospect Focuses on Progress, Not Significance of Being Part of Beltran Trade
headline.print_headline: Mets Prospect Focuses on Progress, Not Significance of Being Part of Beltran Trade
